mapper.select: select id, pid, content, nickname, avatar, link, create_time, browser, os, address from t_comment where article_id = #{articleId} and pid = ${@site.alanliang.geekblog.common.Constant@COMMENT_LINKED_LIST_ROOT} order by create_time DESC

select tc1.id, tc1.pid, tc1.content, tc1.nickname, tc1.avatar, tc1.link, tc1.create_time, tc1.browser, tc1.os, tc1.address, tc2.nickname as parent_nickname from (select id, pid, content, nickname, avatar, link, create_time, browser, os, address from t_comment where article_id = #{articleId}) tc1 left join (select id, nickname from t_comment where article_id = #{articleId}) tc2 on tc1.pid = tc2.id order by tc1.create_time DESC

select id, pid, content, nickname, avatar, link, create_time, browser, os, address from t_comment where article_id IS NULL and pid = ${@site.alanliang.geekblog.common.Constant@COMMENT_LINKED_LIST_ROOT} order by create_time DESC

select tc1.id, tc1.pid, tc1.content, tc1.nickname, tc1.avatar, tc1.link, tc1.create_time, tc1.browser, tc1.os, tc1.address, tc2.nickname as parent_nickname from (select id, pid, content, nickname, avatar, link, create_time, browser, os, address from t_comment where article_id IS NULL) tc1 left join (select id, nickname from t_comment where article_id IS NULL) tc2 on tc1.pid = tc2.id order by tc1.create_time DESC
